text: The Miners () is a 1937 Soviet comedy movie directed by Sergei Yutkevich.К столетию со дня рождения Марка БернесаШахтеры (1937) It stars Boris Poslavsky, Yuriy Tolubeev, and Vladimir Lukin. == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian comedy movies Category:Russian drama movies Category:1937 comedy movies Category:1937 drama movies Category:1930s comedy-drama movies Category:Movies directed by Sergei Yutkevich Category:Soviet comedy movies Category:Soviet drama movies
title: The Miners
